Russia: Bay of Pigs Invasion: After a U.S. bombing run against the Cuban air force, a group of 1,500 armed exiles landed at the Bay of Pigs on the southern coast. As the invasion faltered, President John F. Kennedy called off the airstrikes.
Bay of Pigs Invasion: Castro announced that all the invaders had been defeated.
Construction began on the Berlin Wall.
In a nationally broadcast speech, Castro declared he was a Marxist-Leninist and that Cuba was going to adopt Communism.
Sino-Albanian split: The People's Republic of China severed diplomatic ties with Albania.
